docs.lead_paragraph: Financial fraud of retirees is on the rise, but it is preventable if you simply ask a few pointed questions or hire an outside financial adviser to perform due diligence.

headline.seo: Fight Financial Fraud With Tricks of Your Own
headline.main: Fight Financial Fraud With Tricks of Your Own
headline.print_headline: Fight Financial Fraud With Tricks of Your Own

docs.abstract: Older investors are often besieged by swindlers because they tend to have higher net worth and are more accessible to crooks than younger Americans; retirees and their families are advised to call upon financial advisers and lawyers, and perhaps law enforcement authorities, for guidance.
docs.snippet: Financial fraud of retirees is on the rise, but it is preventable if you simply ask a few pointed questions or hire an outside financial adviser to perform due diligence.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some are discovering that another country can offer a vibrant retirement lifestyle.

headline.seo: Cheap and Colorful, an Overseas Home Beckons
headline.main: Cheap and Colorful, an Overseas Home Beckons
headline.print_headline: Cheap and Colorful, an Overseas Home Beckons

docs.abstract: Many Americans are discovering that retirement in another country is an option that offers a vibrant lifestyle, and find that they can stretch their dollars farther and enjoy a more comfortable standard of living; current generation of retirees is embracing the idea of living abroad at a much greater rate than those in the past.
docs.snippet: Some are discovering that another country can offer a vibrant retirement lifestyle.

docs.abstract: Should religious organizations be subject to the same rules and taxes as secular ones?
docs.snippet: Should religious organizations be subject to the same rules and taxes as secular ones?

headline.main: New Estimate Sees Rise in Medical Costs in Retirement

docs.abstract: Fidelity Investments estimates that couples aged 65 retiring this year will need $240,000 for medical costs in retirement.
docs.snippet: Fidelity Investments estimates that couples aged 65 retiring this year will need $240,000 for medical costs in retirement.

docs.abstract: Senator Scott P. Brown on Wednesday released the first television ad of his re-election campaign in Massachusetts, highlighting central campaign themes of independence and bipartisanship.
docs.snippet: Senator Scott P. Brown on Wednesday released the first television ad of his re-election campaign in Massachusetts, highlighting central campaign themes of independence and bipartisanship.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a rare step, doctors revising psychiatry’s diagnostic manual have retreated from two controversial proposals that would have expanded the number of people identified as having psychotic or depressive disorders.

headline.seo: D.S.M. Panel Backs Down on Diagnoses
headline.main: Psychiatry Manual Drafters Back Down on Diagnoses
headline.print_headline: Psychiatry Manual Drafters Back Down on Diagnoses

docs.abstract: Doctors on a panel appointed by the American Psychiatric Assn revising the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, in a rare step, retreat from two controversial proposals that would have expanded the number of people identified as having psychotic or depressive disorders.
docs.snippet: In a rare step, doctors revising psychiatry’s diagnostic manual have retreated from two controversial proposals that would have expanded the number of people identified as having psychotic or depressive disorders.

keywords.value: Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

docs.lead_paragraph: A former tax lawyer calls for eliminating the Bush tax cuts for all and ending most tax breaks. Readers are invited to respond.

headline.main: Invitation to a Dialogue: A Call for Tax Reform
headline.print_headline: Invitation to a Dialogue: A Call for Tax Reform

docs.snippet: A former tax lawyer calls for eliminating the Bush tax cuts for all and ending most tax breaks. Readers are invited to respond.

docs.lead_paragraph: In his new book, the veteran food writer Peter Kaminsky writes that by maximizing flavor, you can satisfy your food cravings with smaller portions.

headline.seo: The Author Peter Kaminsky on How to Eat Wisely
headline.main: Eating Well Without the Flavor of Shame
headline.print_headline: Eating Well Without the Flavor of Shame

docs.abstract: Veteran food writer Peter Kaminsky argues in his new book Culinary Intelligence: The Art of Eating Healthy (and Really Well) that food cravings can be satisfied by eating small portions of very flavorful foods.
docs.snippet: In his new book, the veteran food writer Peter Kaminsky writes that by maximizing flavor, you can satisfy your food cravings with smaller portions.

headline.main: Business Owners Try to Make Sense of Health Care

docs.abstract: The Supreme Court is expected to rule soon on the constitutionality of the partially implemented Affordable Care Act, an increasingly complicated, costly and uncertain issue for business owners.
docs.snippet: The Supreme Court is expected to rule soon on the constitutionality of the partially implemented Affordable Care Act, an increasingly complicated, costly and uncertain issue for business owners.
